data.text: “Sɛɛ na Awurade ka kyerɛ nea wasra no ngo,
Medi wʼanim
Mede sum mu ademude bɛma wo
Me somfo Yakob nti,
Mene Awurade, obiara nni hɔ bio;
sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a efi nea owia pue
Meyɛ hann, na mebɔ sum.
“Mo ɔsorosoro munhwie trenee ngu fam;
“Nnome nka nea ɔne ne Yɛfo ham
Nnome nka nea ose nʼagya se
“Sɛɛ na Awurade se,
Ɛyɛ me na meyɛɛ asase
Mɛma Kores so wɔ me trenee mu;
Sɛɛ na Awurade se:
Ampa ara, woyɛ Onyankopɔn a ɔde ne ho sie,
Wɔn a wɔyɛ ahoni nyinaa bɛfɛre na wɔn anim agu ase;
Nanso Awurade begye Israel nkwa,
Na sɛɛ na Awurade se,
Menkasaa wɔ kokoa mu,
“Mommoaboa mo ho ano na mommra;
Mompae mu nka nea ebesi, momfa nto gua,
“Monnan mmra me nkyɛn na munnya nkwa,
Maka me ho ntam,
Wɔbɛka me ho asɛm se, ‘Awurade nko ara mu
Nanso Awurade mu, Israel asefo nyinaa
